articles.description: The former Leeds United and Cardiff City boss would be a controversial appointment at St Andrew's as the search for a successor to Pep Clotet beings
articles.content:
Neil Warnock is the new favourite to become the new Birmingham City boss.
Blues have begun the recruitment process in their search for a successor to Pep Clotet who will be vacating the post at the … [+4224 chars]
